kagalla disa kirum minum eekaka pramithi departhamenthuwa pasugiya wasare di kirum, minum upakarana mudra thabimen labu aadayama rupiyal 41,92,994k pamana weyi.me athara giya wasare kagalla disthrikkaye atham welandun mudra nomathi tharadi bhawitha kirima, adu barata kirima, wyaja tharadi bhawithaya, wyaja kirum minum bhawitha karana lada welendun 8653 denek kirum minum eekakaye niladharin wisin karana lada parikshanaye di alla gena atha.mese allagath welendunta kagalla mawanalla, ruwanwalla, warakapola yana mahesthrath adhikaranawala nadu pawarimen pasu dada gasa athi dada mudala rupiyal 148500 k pamana weyi.mema watalima kara aththe kagalla, mawanalla, ruwanwalla, yatiyanthota, daraniyagala, dehioowita athulu pradesha gananawakini.kagalla disa minum eekakaye karya bhara niladharini aar. bi. ranasinha mahathmiya da parikshakawarun wana di. ef. disanayaka mahatha da, parikshaka ke. ee. pi. wi. rathnapala menawiya da mema watalima sidu kara atha..

uthuru palathe idam athpath kara ganima hamuda kandawuru idikirima sandaha nowa ema palathe siwil janathawage subasiddhiya sandaha bawa yapanaya aagnyapathi mejar jenaral mahinda hathurusinha mahatha pawasayi.atham deshapalana kandayam me sambandhayen asathya prachara genayana bawa hethema kiweya.walikamam uthuru pradeshaye idam athpathkara ganimata salasum kara aththe palali guwanthotupala saha kankasanthure waraya pulul kirima sandaha bawath ee anuwa uthuru palatha sanwardhanaya wiya yuthu bawath mejar janaralwaraya prakasha kaleya.mulathiw disthrikkaye idam athpath karaganna bawata palawana wartha prathikshepa karana bawa pawasana ee mahatha wasara 30 kata pera pawathi thaththwayen uthuru palatha wenas kara sanwardhanaya kalayuthu bawa pawasiya.wadamarachchi uthuru pradeshaye idam, janathawa yali padinchikarawima sandaha yoda ganna bawath adala wyapruthi sandaha idam athpathkara ganna janathawata welandapala watinakamata anuwa wandi labadima saha wikalpa idam labadimata salasum kara athi bawath hathurusinha mahatha kiweya.mita amatharawa nawika hamudawada utharu palathe pihiti warayan wanijamata watinakamak athi kirimata katayuthu karamin sitana bawada mejar janaralwaraya prakasha kaleya..
anna eekaya wenasa.
